name: ← ↑ →
description:
This  game was developed as  part of the Experimental Games Lab Project of summer semester 2020 by students of Bauhaus University Weimar. The main goal of the project was to create a prototype in a short amount of time (3 months) to study the general game development process and gain new knowledge. Not few did this for the first time. By collaborating in interdisciplinary groups of three people, media artists, programmers and designers of different study courses worked together.

Credits:

Fabian Krzich - Concept and Sound design

Yun Kuo - Design and Animation

Valentin Birner - Coding and Level design

Gianluca Pandolfo - Project Supervisor
